title: Bigfoot Hunting - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/26/21
itunes:title: Bigfoot Hunting - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/26/21
description:
Guest host Connie Willis and Oklahoma state representative Justin Humphrey explore his newly filed legislation that would create hunting licenses to hunt and capture a Bigfoot, and a $2 million dollar bounty for the first person to trap the creature alive.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Guest host Connie Willis and Oklahoma state representative Justin Humphrey explore his newly filed legislation that would create hunting licenses to hunt and capture a Bigfoot, and a $2 million dollar bounty for the first person to trap the creature alive.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

itunes:summary: A politician discusses his proposed law to allow humans to capture Bigfoot.
itunes:author: Coast to Coast AM
